multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: FX; DXY rally driven by short‑covering ahead of US CPI and dovish Fed comments, while EUR/USD weakness reflects geopolitical risk and tariff concerns. Fed policy outlook and upcoming CPI are key catalysts for currency moves.

category.motivation: The article provides analysis of market movements (dollar index, gold) in response to geopolitical and policy statements, fitting a market commentary.
